Posts.EditableText:
I am 10,954 km away from uk.

Everytime I try to load https://textadventures.co.uk/
it takes 15-30 seconds, I tried to enable cookie and it seems a few seconds faster, but I am not good at computer, so perhaps I am not enabling the cookies to the best extent. (Please show me how then.)

The very strange thing is it consistently takes around 5 seconds to load https://textadventures.co.uk/forum, resulting in me being more participating in there than testing out other people games, so I wonder if it has to do with the website itself, not configurating the incoming connections that well.

Other strange errors are
1. When I post games, it will say fail and ask me to retry, of course, I will not retry because the game is already posted unlike the warning.
2. When I post forum message, it will say fail and ask me to retry, which is strange, because my forum message is already posted.
3. When I play online other game creators' games, there are 50% of lags and crashes, so I have to download the games most of the time, or perhaps, the original intention is for us to play downloaded games and playing online is simply a fad?
Posts.HTML:
I am 10,954 km away from uk.

Everytime I try to load https://textadventures.co.uk/
it takes 15-30 seconds, I tried to enable cookie and it seems a few seconds faster, but I am not good at computer, so perhaps I am not enabling the cookies to the best extent. (Please show me how then.)

The very strange thing is it consistently takes around 5 seconds to load https://textadventures.co.uk/forum, resulting in me being more participating in there than testing out other people games, so I wonder if it has to do with the website itself, not configurating the incoming connections that well.

Other strange errors are

  1. When I post games, it will say fail and ask me to retry, of course, I will not retry because the game is already posted unlike the warning.
  2. When I post forum message, it will say fail and ask me to retry, which is strange, because my forum message is already posted.
  3. When I play online other game creators' games, there are 50% of lags and crashes, so I have to download the games most of the time, or perhaps, the original intention is for us to play downloaded games and playing online is simply a fad?
